means: 头上不戴东西的，光着头的

sentence.Network_en: One of the police officers was bareheaded, though in uniform.
sentence.Network_cn: 一位警官虽然穿了制服，但是没有戴帽子。

sentence.Network_en: He was bareheaded in the rain.
sentence.Network_cn: 他淋在雨中，头上什么也没戴。

entry.def: Someone who is bareheaded is not wearing a hat or any other covering on their head.

example.ex: He was bareheaded in the rain...
example.tran: 他淋在雨中，头上什么也没戴。
